entry.title: Easter Bunny BAGS - Cotton Linen
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 7.20

Easter bunny bags in cotton linen with bright coloured linings. Customize with vinyl or embroidery.

Add a bunny face and a name or just a bunny face and personalize with an egg shape name tag! You can find the egg shaped acrylic blanks here.

Dimensions are 12 inches high (not including ears) by 12 inches wide at the bottom with a slight taper towards the top with it being 10 inches. The gusset is 4 inches.

entry.title: Stuffed Elephants - 16 inches
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 13.00

Cute and colourful plush Elephants! People do htv on the ears of these but they are furry. We won't be able to offer refunds for 'furry ears'. They are 100% polyester. 

Elephants measure 16" or 40cm approx. From the top of the head to the bottom of the foot. The bottom does contain weighted beads so they sit up nicely. They do have plastic eyes and won't be safe for very young children.

In the one picture, you will see our 16" pink and grey elephants posing with a smaller 10" elephant in cream colour.

entry.title: Ballerina Stuffed Bunny
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 6.95

Super soft bunnies!

Measured from the top of head to toe is 32cm. I did not include ears in that measurement.

Bunny has one long ear and one shorter ear. This is his design and it makes him more charming.

He has no button eyes or hard plastic pieces on him.

These bunnies comply with all safety standards and are manufactured for a UK company for the European market. They are not dollar store quality bunnies.

entry.title: Canvas Name Plate Bunny BUCKETS -
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 7.95

Cute Easter basket for your little ones. 

Handles are offset to accommodate a name or decoration placed vertically beside the bunny. The offset may not be uniform between buckets. Not all designs are centered.

Buckets measure approx. 9in diameter x10in height

entry.title: Spring Stripe Pajama - Short Sleeve BLUE
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 14.75

2 piece pajama set - 95% Cotton 5% Spandex 

This style does have a slight flare in the body of the top. This could be considered a feminine cut. 

Please review the size charts and when in doubt size up! Please keep in mind that the size chart number is based on the pyjamas lying flat on a table and being measured one side.

We are hearing that the children's sizes are fairly true to size but you may wish to size up if you are unsure. Safety regulations do recommend pyjamas fit close to the body. 

No refunds if you ordered the wrong size.

 

No refunds if you ordered the wrong size.

entry.title: POLYESTER Easter Bunny BUCKET for SUB Pink
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 7.95

Easter bunny buckets in polyester are perfect for sublimation printing but also work for vinyl. 

The suggested print size is 15cm high x 18cm wide with a pressing pillow inside. If you are able to feed the basket directly over a small platen on your heat-press you can use 18cm x 18cm size. 250C for 45seconds, allow it to cool before removing your print paper.

Each bag measures approximately 25x20cm with a gusset bottom which gives you a large space for Easter treats and gifts.

Watch Crafting with Cora make this bag in a video tutorial here

Small cotton canvas bag with bright fuzzy linings. Long and adjustable strap.

entry.title: Bunny Ear Cushion Covers 4 Colours
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 12.65

Floppy ears and a pom-pom tail. This snuggly cushion cover will match our bunny ear blankets perfectly! These are very boutique worthy. They have stunning details in the edging and are a beautiful weight. Each has a 2 button closure on the back.

Approx 14 inches x 14 inches 100% acrylic, this may vary a little due to the knit nature. 

Made in China

entry.title: Bunny Ear Blankets 3 Colours
entry.summary:

Type:
Price: 17.00

Floppy ears and a pom-pom tail. These snuggly blankets are very boutique worthy. They have stunning details in the edging and are a beautiful weight. 

Approx 42 inches x 29 inches 100% acrylic, this may vary a little due to the knit nature. 

Made in China

entry.title: Dragon Bucket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 7.50

Cute Dragon bucket for your little ones. Or maybe it's a crocodile, alligator or dinosaur! Adorable faces with a blue lining.

Buckets measure approx. 9inches high by 9inches across the opening. Not including handle, spikes or ears.

Made in China

entry.title: Unicorn Bucket - Gold Horn
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 7.50

Cute Curly Mane Unicorn bucket for your little ones. Adorable faces with a beautiful gold horn and pink lining.

Buckets measure approx. 9inches high by 9inches across the opening. Not including handle, ears or horn. 

Made in China

entry.title: Faux Fur Bunny - PURPLE
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 3.80

So incredibly soft! These were almost impossible to take a picture of. They just sort of melt. They are so super squishy! Each with a solid ring attachment to clip to a bag or backpack. The inside of the ear is a soft smooth fabric to add a small personalization. 

Please note that the gold stitching on the feet is stitched through but not tied off with a knot. It is just the way they are manufactured. I have included a close up of the feet.

entry.title: Bunny Key Chain - 2pcs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 2.95 - 22.00 (2 variants)

Cute set of keychains. One with a bowtie and one with a heart. Each says love inside the ear. Break up the set and sell individually or keep together. 

Metal Alloy

Made in China

entry.title: Silver Bunny Barrette
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 2.70

Sweet rabbit barrette. These have a nice strong clip and are a very generous 5cm or 2 inches long. The end of the clip does extend longer. 

With your own cute packaging, these will make excellent Easter basket stuffers.

entry.title: Bunny Earrings - Solid Bunny
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 3.95

Available in silver, gold and rose gold. Delicate bunny rabbit outline earrings.

Each pair comes with -

- a blank kraft earring card for you to add your custom stamp or branding

- an organza gift bag

Earrings are nickel, cadmium and lead-free. They are a metal alloy. 

*made in China

entry.title: KIDS Moose pajama pants **LIMITED**
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 12.50

Bottoms only!

Fabric :75% polyester ,20% cotton ,5% spandex .
Elastic waist, no drawstring.

Unisex fit.

Women may wish to go one size down. This is a very loose fit. 

 These are in-stock but this is a limited buy and they cannot be re-ordered. When they are sold out, they are gone. 

Please follow the size chart. No refunds if you ordered the wrong size. 

These fit true to size (TTS) or slightly big.
